content: crochet this beautiful cozy and modern smiles for miles blanket to welcome your new arrival this blanket is designed to be an heirloom piece that will be loved and used for years to come if you re looking for a quick and easy pattern this is the perfect project for you this pattern is considered an easy level crochet pattern because it uses one basic stitch single_crochet throughout the blanket and the border is crocheted with the body of the blanket to make things easier there are step-by-step pictures helpful tips and a complete video tutorial for extra support included below > the **free pattern for the baby blanket** can be found **here ** 1 along with instructions to create a custom sized blanket > buy 2 patterns get 1 free with coupon code freepattern add all 3 patterns to your cart and use the coupon code discount will be applied at checkout > **pattern bundle - 4 crochet baby blanket patterns including this one for $10 https //www ravelry com/redeem/this-pixie-creates sale=345531 skill level easy / advanced beginner language english crochet terminology us terms > the **complete video tutorial** for the baby blanket can be found **here** 2 crochet stitches single_crochet and single_crochet spike stitch * medium 4 worsted weight yarn is used for this design * the pattern is written in us crochet terminology * the border is crocheted at the same time as the body of the blanket to make it easier and faster to crochet * finished dimensions of the original blanket are 36 wide x 40 long * instructions are included for making 8 blanket sizes baby lapghan small and large throw twin full queen and king along with instructions to make a custom size * step-by-step pictures and a complete video tutorial for the baby blanket size are included * the printable pdf is a total of 13 pages * 2 pdfs are included one with pictures and one without * this pattern is written in english other details * 6 0 mm and 6 5mm crochet hooks needed * medium 4 worsted weight yarn is used for this design * pattern has been tech edited i hope you enjoy making this blanket pattern for you and your loved ones 1 https //thispixiecreates com/how-to-crochet-the-smiles-for-miles-blanket/ 2 https //www youtube com/watch v=mqg33ihj1_k
